TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PagerSettings extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class PagerSettings Implements IStateManager
public ref class PagerSettings sealed : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 表示支持分页的控件中的分页控件的属性。

span.span: Represents the properties of the paging controls in a control that supports pagination.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持分页的控件（如 、和 控件）可以显示一组称为 *"页导航*" 的控件，该控件允许用户在控件中导航页面。Controls that support pagination (such as the , , and controls) can display a set of controls called *the pager* that allows the user to navigate the pages within the control. 这些控件使用 类来表示页导航的属性。The class is used by these controls to represent the properties of the pager. 通常， 对象存储在控件的 `PagerSettings` 属性中。In general, the object is stored in the `PagerSettings` property of the control. 您可以通过设置 "" 对象的属性来自定义页导航。You can customize the pager by setting the properties of the object. 寻呼支持多种不同的显示模式。The pager supports several different display modes. 若要指定显示寻呼的模式，请设置 "" 属性。To specify the mode in which to display the pager, set the property. 下表描述了不同的模式。The following table describes the different modes. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||上一页和下一页按钮。Previous-page and next-page buttons.| ||上一页、下一页、第一页和最后一页按钮。Previous-page, next-page, first-page, and last -page buttons.| ||用于直接访问页的带编号的链接按钮。Numbered link buttons to access pages directly.| ||编号链接、第一个链接和最后一个链接按钮。Numbered-link, first-link, and last-link buttons.| 如果 属性设置为 、或 值，则可以通过设置下表中显示的属性来自定义非数值按钮的文本。When the property is set to the , , or value you can customize the text of the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||第一页按钮的文本。Text for the first-page button.| ||上一页按钮的文本。Text for the previous-page button.| ||下一页按钮的文本。Text for the next-page button.| ||"最后一页" 按钮的文本。Text for the last-page button.| 作为替代方法，还可以通过设置下表中所示的属性来显示非数值按钮的图像。As an alternative, you can also display images for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties as shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||为最后一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| > [!NOTE] > 设置 image 属性后，相应的文本属性将充当图像的替换文字。When an image property is set, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，设置 属性时， 属性指定的文本将显示为图像的替换文字。For example, when the property is set, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还显示为相应按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 如果 属性设置为 或 值，则可以通过设置 属性来指定要在页导航中显示的页按钮的数量。When the property is set to the or value, you can specify the number of page buttons to display in the pager by setting the property. 页导航可显示在控件的顶部、底部或同时显示在顶部和底部。The pager can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of a control. 若要指定页导航的位置，请设置 属性。To specify the position of the pager, set the property. 若要显示或隐藏页导航，请使用 属性。To show or hide the pager, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性中包含的 对象来自定义 控件的页导航行中显示的按钮的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object that is contained in the property to customize the text of the buttons that are displayed in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/CS/PagerSettingsTextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/VB/PagerSettingsTextvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数创建 类的新实例。Use the constructor to create a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 当在自定义控件中提供分页支持时，控件开发人员通常会使用 构造函数。The constructor generally is used by control developers when providing paging support in a custom control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FirstPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FirstPageImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 或 值时，请使用 属性指定要为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the URL to an image to display for the first-page button. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，您可以通过设置 "" 属性而不是 "" 属性来显示第一页按钮的文本。As an alternative, you can display text for the first-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果同时设置了 "" 和 "" 属性，则将显示图像，其 属性作为图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还显示为相应按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 控件的页导航行中的第一页按钮显示图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an image for the first-page button in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/CS/PagerSettingsImagescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/VB/PagerSettingsImagesvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 默认值为"<< "，呈现为"<<"。

span.span: The default is "<<", which renders as "<<".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 或 值时，请使用 属性指定要为第一页按钮显示的文本。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the text to display for the first-page button. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，您可以通过设置 "" 属性而不是 "" 属性，为第一页按钮显示图像。As an alternative, you can display an image for the first-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果同时设置了 "" 和 "" 属性，则将显示图像，其 属性作为图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还显示为相应按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来自定义为 控件中的页导航行的第一页按钮显示的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to customize the text that is displayed for the first-page button of the pager row in a control. summary.span: 获取或设置支持分页的控件中的页导航控件的显示模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the mode in which to display the pager controls in a control that supports pagination.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持分页的控件提供多种模式，用于显示分页控件。Controls that support pagination provide multiple modes in which to display the paging controls. 使用 属性指定模式。Use the property to specify the mode. 下表描述了分页控件的不同模式。The following table describes the different modes for pagination controls. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||上一页和下一页按钮。Previous-page and next-page buttons.| ||上一页、下一页、第一页和最后一页按钮。Previous-page, next-page, first-page, and last-page buttons.| ||用于直接访问页的带编号的链接按钮。Numbered link buttons to access pages directly.| ||编号和第一个链接和最后一个链接按钮。Numbered and first-link and last-link buttons.| 如果 属性设置为 、或 值，则可以通过设置下表中显示的属性为非数值按钮指定自定义文本。When the property is set to the , , or value, you can specify custom text for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||第一页按钮的文本。Text for the first-page button.| ||上一页按钮的文本。Text for the previous-page button.| ||下一页按钮的文本。Text for the next-page button.| ||"最后一页" 按钮的文本。Text for the last-page button.| 作为替代方法，还可以通过设置下表中显示的属性来显示非数值按钮的图像。As an alternative, you can also display images for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为第一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||为下一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||为最后一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| > [!NOTE] > 设置 image 属性后，相应的文本属性将充当图像的替换文字。When an image property is set, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，设置 属性时， 属性指定的文本将显示为图像的替换文字。For example, when the property is set, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还显示为相应按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定 控件的页导航行应显示数值按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager row for a control should display numeric buttons. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/CS/PagerSettingsNumericcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/VB/PagerSettingsNumericvb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 值之一。

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要显示寻呼的位置。Use the property to specify the location at which to display the pager. 下表描述了不同的位置。The following table describes the different positions. |位置Position|位置Location| |--------------|--------------| ||控件的底部。The bottom of the control.| ||控件的顶部。The top of the control.| ||位于控件的顶部和底部。At both the top and bottom of the control.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性显示 控件底部的页导航行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the pager row at the bottom of a control. summary.span: 获取或设置为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.

span.span: The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为 或 值时，请使用 属性指定为上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the URL to an image to display for the previous-page button. > [!NOTE] > 作为替代方法，您可以通过设置 "" 属性而不是 属性来显示上一页按钮的文本。As an alternative, you can display text for the previous-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果同时设置了 "" 和 "" 属性，则将显示图像，其 属性作为图像的替换文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器上，此文本还显示为相应按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 控件的页导航行中的上一页按钮显示图像。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an image for the previous-page button in the pager row of a control. summary.span: 当 对象的属性更改值时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a property of a object changes values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次 对象的属性更改值时，都会引发 事件。The event is raised each time a property of a object changes values. 事件通常由支持分页的数据绑定控件用于在分页设置更改时将数据重新绑定到控件。The event commonly is used by data-bound controls that support pagination to rebind the data to the control when the pager settings change. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 "" 属性可指定分页控件是否显示在支持分页的控件中。Use the property to specify whether the paging controls are displayed in a control that supports pagination. 若要隐藏分页控件，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To hide the paging controls, set the property to `false`. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示当 控件处于编辑模式时，如何使用 属性隐藏页导航行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the pager row when a control is in edit mode.
